summary: A philosophy teacher soldiers through the death of her mother, losing her book deal, and dealing with a husband who is cheating on her.
cast: Isabelle Huppert|André Marcon|Roman Kolinka|Edith Scob|Sarah Le Picard|Solal Forte|Guy-Patrick Sainderichin|Yves Heck|Rachel Arditi|Charline Bourgeois-Tacquet|Elise Lhomeau|Lionel Dray|Larissa Guist|Linus Westheuser|Clemens Melzer|Grégoire Montana|Lina Benzerti|Joachim Cohen|Anouk Buron|Jules Stolar|Olivier Goinard|Jean-Charles Clichet|Elie Wajeman|Héloïse Dugas|Ruggero Barbera|Marion Ploquin|Arnaud Giacomini|Joachim Azouze|Ludovic Rosenstein|Anne Monteil|Rosalie Legoux|Marie Fluhr|Claire Choquet|Swan Daliphard|Simon Guérand|Ruben Murray|François Fihey|Pauline Prévost|Paul Olivennes|Vera Derrida|Hugo Ba|Alexis Nicolas|Orféo Campanella|Nathan Blacher|Audrey Fabre|Julianne Binard|Claire Guillon|Constance Rousseau|Nicolas Sarkozy
keywords: philosophy teacher|reference to slavoj zizek|strong female character|strong female lead|infidelity
title: El porvenir
